actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to Oliver Sipple for his selfless heroism in preventing the assassination of Gerald R. Ford, President of the United States of America.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives, on behalf of the people of the United States, express their complete and unqualified gratitute to Oliver Sipple for preventing an assailant from assassinating President Ford.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to Oliver Sipple for his selfless heroism in preventing the assassination of Gerald R. Ford, President of the United States of America.
